TopicTitle: Need your own thread moved or locked? Post here.

Articles.Content:
Is it possible to un-archive specific threads?

I just found this link in my dev sticky. It looks archived. It's meant to be a tutorial I think.

I don't know how much help it will be to you, but here you go (topic locked to prevent necromancy):

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24569-How-to-add-a-dockingNode-in-unity/

Thanks. It's not for me, it's for the masses.

Actually there are more in that post that have been archived. If I made a list could they be brought back as well?

Edited January 1, 2015 by Cpt. Kipard
I don't see why not.

Can I get the poll on my Impossible Innovations thread deleted? I made a mistake when creating it.

--Thank you very much, whoever did it!

Edited January 2, 2015 by jandcando

Sal's gotten rid of it for you.

If you need to edit a poll in future, I believe the Edit Poll option should be available from the Thread Tools menu.
Could a mod please give me ownership of this thread. Check my inbox for the PM from Wanderfound giving me permission.
We can't actually check your inbox, funnily enough. Please report the PM in question (as this will allow us to view it) and make this request in the report message.
I've just seen the OP of that thread change from a post I made somewhere else to a copy of the post by Wanderfound, with his post right below. How are you guys actually doing it?

Well, the forum doesn't technically permit that occurrence, but we can get around it by making a copy of a post made at an earlier date than the target thread's OP. This copy is placed into the thread, and the forum software then assumes that the user who made that post is the thread's OP, since posts in a thread are sorted by post date. We then typically copy the original OP into the new one and delete the old OP, as was done just now.

It's a bit of fussing around, but it works in the end.
I need this thread deleted.... http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106014-Delete-this
Thread deleted

Why am I subscribed to this thread?

The CrowdSourcedScience thread has a little page next to it. Can I get rid of it?

Why am I subscribed to this thread?

The CrowdSourcedScience thread has a little page next to it. Can I get rid of it?

I have no idea, you must have clicked on Thread Tools and Subscribe to this Thread...
Can someone help me get rid of the little folded-page icon in the top, to the left of the title? It's in this thread.
Figured it out, you can choose post icons when you post, they can be removed by editing the thread
